text:
@JeremySWallace @GovAbbott @DanPatrick @realDonaldTrump @VP

Murder most foul. 

Your denial and premature reopening (after barely shutting down) will be responsible for the DEATHS of thousands of Texans. Your COVID-19 will spread from Texas to us!!

FAILED LEADERSHIP & CORRUPTION
